title: Unai Emery - Wikipedia
snippet: There, he won a Ligue 1 title, two Coupe de France titles, two Coupe de la Ligues, and two Trophée des Champions, including a domestic quadruple in his second season. After the expiry of his contract, Emery was appointed as head coach of English club Arsenal in 2018, succeeding Arsène Wenger.

title: Welcome Unai | News | Arsenal.com
snippet: I’m excited about what we can do together and I look forward to giving everyone who loves Arsenal some special moments and memories.” Unai started his coaching career at Lorca Deportiva in 2005 after playing mostly in the Spanish second division.

title: Unai Emery at Arsenal: a failure or a victim of circumstance? - ESPN
snippet: Unai Emery is enjoying so much ... Wenger. In the summer of 2018, the Spanish coach was hired to replace the departing Wenger, who had fallen from legend to lamented in a tenure spanning almost 22 years....

title: Arsenal: The rise and fall of Unai Emery
snippet: Unai Emery spent 18 months as Arsenal's head coach. Here, we chart his rise and fall as he attempted to lead the club out of Arsene Wenger's shadow.
